name: qBittorrent Theme
summary: Learn about .QBTHEME files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: qBittorrent is one of many peer-to-peer (P2P) file-sharing programs used to retrieve and send content over the BitTorrent network. It is available for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

Users who want to customize qBittorrent's appearance can do so using QBTHEME files. Each QBTHEME file contains binary data used to reskin qBittorrent's user interface (UI). Most commonly, users share and download QBTHEME files from online repositories. For example, you can download many different QBTHEME files from https://github.com/jagannatharjun/qbt-theme.

description: A QBTHEME file is a theme used to alter the appearance of qBittorent, a torrenting application. qBittorrent users commonly download QBTHEME files from online theme repositories.

instructions: To apply a QBTHEME file to qBittorrent:
Open the Options or Preferences menu.
Select the Use custom UI Theme checkbox.
Select the Folder icon and open your QBTHEME file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .qbtheme file in qBittorrent 4
images.caption: QBTHEME file open in qBittorrent 4
